What’s New in Version 4.6

*Introduced GEICO's new virtual assistant, Kate. She can help answer questions and assist you with your insurance needs. (Not available in all state

*Introduced GEICO's new virtual assistant, Kate. She can help answer questions and assist you with your insurance needs. (Not available in all state
Minor bug fixes.
Minor bug fixes.

What’s new in version 4.7
*Have you checked out our new virtual assistant, Kate? We gave her vocal chords so she can chat with you.
*Want more options for finding a ride other than taxis or your friends? We’ve added Lyft in our app. Ride handled.

What’s new in version 4.7
*Have you checked out our new virtual assistant, Kate? We gave her vocal chords so she can chat with you.
*Want more options for finding a ride other than taxis or your friends? We’ve added Lyft in our app. Ride handled.

What’s New in 4.8
*You know we insure the things that move you, but what about the other stuff? Check out some special offers just for you.
*Updated the main page to show relevant items to you. Have a payment due soon? You’ll see it. If not… you won

What’s New in 4.8
*You know we insure the things that move you, but what about the other stuff? Check out some special offers just for you.
*Updated the main page to show relevant items to you. Have a payment due soon? You’ll see it. If not… you won
Minor bug fixes
Minor bug fixes

What’s New in 4.9
*We’re keeping our look fresh. This time you’ll notice updates to the Login page.
*Ready to make a change? Find your saved quote on the Policy Dashboard to easily pick up where you left off.
*Squashed some bugs.

What’s New in 4.9
*We’re keeping our look fresh. This time you’ll notice updates to the Login page.
*Ready to make a change? Find your saved quote on the Policy Dashboard to easily pick up where you left off.
*Squashed some bugs.

What’s new in version 4.10
*New to GEICO Mobile? It’s quicker than ever to set up your account!
*Learn how you can save money with a Renters or Homeowners quote!
*Chat with Kate; she has a brand new look!
